MemberSignature.Value: public static ref T Unbox<T> (object box) where T : struct;
.method public static hidebysig !!T Unbox<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T>(object box) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unbox(Of T As Structure) (box As Object) As T
static member Unbox : obj -> (requires 'T : struct)

span.span: The type to be unboxed.
The value to unbox.

summary.span: 傳回 至 boxed 值。

span.span: Returns a to a boxed value.

returns.span: 參考 boxed 值 的 。

span.span: A to the boxed value .

remarks.format: `Unbox`方法是只包裝函式的 IL [unbox](xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unbox)指令。The `Unbox` method is simply a wrapper for the IL [unbox](xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unbox) instruction. 它適合當做效能最佳化。It is useful as a performance optimization. 每當 API 採用必須重複呼叫使用不同的實值類型，相同的值] 方塊中的物件可重複使用而不是 [新，每次建立一個。Whenever an API that takes an needs to be called repeatedly with different values of a value type, the same box object can be reused rather than a new one created each time. `Unbox`方法有很重要的使用方式的條件約束，不會強制使用語言編譯器，這是呼叫者的責任。The `Unbox` method has an important usage constraint that is not enforced by language compilers and that is the responsibility of the caller. IL`unbox`指令傳回的控制層可變動性的 managed 的指標。The IL `unbox` instruction returns a controlled-mutability managed pointer. 因為.NET 和.NET 語言編譯器無法表示這個條件約束`Unbox`方法會傳回一般可變動`ref T`。Because .NET and .NET language compilers cannot represent this constraint, the `Unbox` method returns a normal mutable `ref T`. 但是開發人員**不得**變動傳回的參考，除非它們是確定`T`是可變動的結構類型。However developers **must not** mutate the returned reference unless they are certain that `T` is a mutable struct type. 例如，因為這類的數值基本不是可變動的結構類型，下列程式碼不支援：For example, because the numeric primitives such as are not mutable struct types, the following code is not suppported: ```csharp Unsafe.Box(obj) = 30; ``` 相較之下，這類的型別是可變動的結構，含有公用屬性 setter，因此支援下列程式碼：In contrast, a type such as is a mutable struct with public property setters, so the following code is supported: ```csharp Unsafe.Unbox(obj).X = 50; ``` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱章節 III.1.8.1.2.2 (「 受控 muttability managed 指標 」) 和 III.4.32 （「 進行 unbox 處理--將 boxed 實的值類型轉換成其原始格式 」） 中[ECMA-335:通用語言基礎結構 (CLI) 分割區我 VI](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-335.pdf)。For more information, see sections III.1.8.1.2.2 ("Controlled-muttability managed pointers") and III.4.32 ("unbox -- convert boxed value type to its raw form") in [ECMA-335: Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) Partitions I to VI](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-335.pdf).

exception.span: 是 ，且 不可為 Null 的實值型別。

span.span: is , and is a non-nullable value type.

exception.span: 不是 boxed 實值型別。

span.span: is not a boxed value type.
